entry.title: BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 LED Facial Therapy Device
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 89.99

Product Description:

BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 LED Facial Therapy Device nourishes your face and neck, remove unwanted acne, tightens the pores, whitens the skin, eliminate wrinkles, and rejuvenate the skin for younger-looking you!



ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY

It uses natural light waves transmitted by the LED lights into our skin activating photoreceptors in skin cells


BETTER SKINCARE ABSORPTION

It improves the absorption of beauty products in our skin 10 times than usual.


NOURISHES THE SKIN

The needleless mesotherapy function of this device directly delivers nutrition into the dermal layer of the skin!



IMPROVES LOOSE SKIN!

BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 LED Facial Therapy Device uses Radio Frequency current to improve the sagging of the skin, promotes blood circulation, and prevents wrinkles from coming!


HEALS AND REPAIRS

This device even heals and repairs the skin using the needle-free LED phototherapy!



COMPLETELY PAINLESS

It is the newest and painless treatment to tighten your pores and restore the smoothness and glow of your skin!


SAFE and EFFECTIVE

BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 LED Facial Therapy Device is 100% SAFE and gentle to the skin! It is designed to treat your facial problem without harming your face.


6 Type of Modes

Mode 1: Pink light

Wavelength: 415nm (+ - 10nm)

Skin whitening


Mode 2: Pink Flashing light

Makes skin clearer


Mode 3: Red light

Wavelength: 620nm (+ - 10nm)

Makes skin more elastic and bright


Mode 4: Yellow light

Wavelength: 590nm (+ - 10nm)

For detoxification


Mode 5: Blue light

Wavelength: 465nm (+ - 10nm)

For tension and acne, ideal for oily skin


Mode 6: Green light

Wavelength: 520nm (+ - 10nm)

Treat dark spots


Get to know the FAQs!


Is BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 LED Facial Therapy Device the best solution for all your skin concerns?

BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 Skin Rejuvenation LED Facial Therapy Device whitens the skin, removes unwanted acne, minimizes pores, nourishes the face and neck, eliminates all signs of aging, and rejuvenates the skin. Absolutely the BEST!


How fast can I see the results?

If a month or a week sounds promising to you wait till you try this device! In as fast as 2 to 3 days, you can witness significant changes to your visage!


Is it Scientifically proven?

LED Light therapy has been validated by medical labs and universities all around the globe and even NASA, so yes, it is!


Is it SAFE to use?

BeautyGuru‚Ñ¢ 5-in-1 LED Facial Therapy Device is 100% SAFE with no negative or harmful effect on the skin!


Is this more economical than other beauty products?

But of course! Unlike conventional products which sometimes come with hefty prices, delivers only one facial solution, and the upsetting long wait, this device allows you to experience a change in your complexion in as fast as 2 days! It solves not just one but almost all of your facial concerns too!


How to Use:


Step 1: Clean your skin first and make sure you're not wearing any metal stuff.

Step 2: Apply lotion or essential on skin.

Step 3: Plug in the device and select the mode you want to try. Press once for red, twice for green, thrice for blue, four for yellow, fifth for pink, and sixth for flashing pink.

Step 4: Move the device slowly to your face.


*The device will automatically shut down after 10 minutes of use.


Specifications:

Material: Acrylic

Size: 20 x 13 x 9cm


Includes:

1 x RF EMS beauty instrument

1 x USB Cable

1 x Charging Stand

1 x English Manual


Notes:

Due to the different monitor and light effect, the actual color of the item might be slightly different from the color shown on the pictures.¬†

entry.title: FONCE Smooth Hydrating Polypeptide Face and Neck Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 29.99

Product Description:

Do your cream really works wonders to your face or just another waste of time and money? If you still can't see those promising promises of your cream, it is time to switch to FONCE Smooth Hydrating Polypeptide Face and Neck Cream!

This cream contains various peptides to hydrate and lighten your skin improving those rough patchy areas of your face including those dry and fine lines! Other ingredients include:

  • Oat Beta Glucan reduces all signs of aging and improves skin texture.
  • Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 eliminates wrinkles and prevent them from coming!
  • Tremella polysaccharide delivers high-efficiency moisturizing effect!
  • Nicotinamide, known as "whitening gold", gives your skin a glass-skin transformation!
  • Centella Asiatica extract repairs the skin's own barrier function and bids goodbye to skin‚Äôs sagging!

FONCE Smooth Hydrating Polypeptide Face and Neck Cream come with double roller for your skin to fully absorb the cream delivering rapidly visible results. Also, this roller provides a lymphatic massage to your face and keeps your chin firm! Indeed, beauty results you thought you‚Äôll only achieve through expensive treatments!

¬†

  • Lifts and lightens neckline
  • Moisturizes the skin
  • Eliminates double-chin
  • Ideal even for sensitive skin

¬†

How to Use:

FONCE Smooth Hydrating Polypeptide Face and Neck Cream is easy to use!

Step 1: Squeeze the right amount of FONCE Smooth Hydrating Polypeptide Face and Neck Cream.

Step 2: Rub the cream from neck to your face.

Step 3: Turn on the roller's switch.

Step 4: Massage the roller to your neck and face.

¬†
